name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dragon Ball HD Wallpaper New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Unleash your inner Super Saiyan with every new tab! Enjoy custom shortcuts, a Google search bar, and dynamic Dragon Ball wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Power up your browsing experience with the Dragon Ball New Tab Extension! Every new tab features an immersive Google search bar to keep you in action, just like Goku. Access popular site shortcuts in a snap, or customize your own to suit your preferences, making your browsing as fast as a Kamehameha wave.

Take your browsing journey to the next level with stunning Dragon Ball wallpapers that change every time you open a new tab. From epic battles to peaceful landscapes, experience the Dragon Ball universe in every click. The extension includes 10 unique and updated Dragon Ball backgrounds to keep things fresh.

Whether youâ€™re powering up for work or just relaxing, this extension keeps you inspired with visuals straight out of the Dragon Ball world. Become your own hero, explore your favorite sites, and keep everything organized with ease.

Time to go Super Saiyan with your new tab experience!
